component.name: getEntriesCount
component.description: Retrieves a beans count based on query specifications.

component.name: getMultipleEntriesByIDs
component.description: Retrieves a list of beans based on specified record IDs.

component.name: getEntryByID
component.description: Retrieves a single bean based on record ID.

component.name: getEntryList
component.description: Retrieves a list of beans based on query specifications.

component.name: setEntryList
component.description: Create or update a list of records.

component.name: setEntry
component.description: Creates or updates a specific record.
